name: Afraid of the Dark (Lividtoaster)
description:
A small project for the https://itch.io/jam/kindred-community-jam-4 game jam.

 It is a visual prototype for a stealth game!

Controls------

W,A,S,D - up,left,down,right

left click - jump/assassinate

Objective --------

--kill all the guards. That's it, didn't have much time to make this so that's all you get.

-made with love with LOVE2d
